    August 28, 2018  |     azavea.com

    HOTLunch: Volunteer Your Lunch Break to Support Disaster Relief Efforts

    October 02, 2017  |     azavea.com

    In 2017, I organized a recurring volunteer opportunity. Donate your lunch break for HOTLunch to map features that NGOs use to plan aid efforts in response to natural disasters and humanitarian needs.
